value.title: Import data from Facebook into Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to import data from Facebook into Power BI using the facebook connector. value.title: Insert blank rows at each category in Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to have a blank row after each category or subcategory, so you can visualize your data in a table? value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
